name: Visual novel for the kids: Lumi And Baby - Hamster And Baby Dragon
name_original: Visual novel for the kids: Lumi And Baby - Hamster And Baby Dragon
description:
Lumi and Baby lost their homes and all the animals in the forest help them.

Visual novel made for children aged 5-8.

- Spend valuable time with your children reading the bedtime story Lumi and Baby.

- Control more on what your children do on the internet and control the hours that your children spend on it.

- Chapters automatically save the story and create a bookmark.

- It is not too long, so it is specially made for children aged 5-8.

- Interactive story, where children use their imagination and make decisions.

- It is entertaining and fun.

- It has beautiful images.

- It has educational words and sounds.

- In families that read the story to their children, it will make the children's language skills and imagination richer and they are able to empathize with other people's feelings better than others.

- In addition to books, children want to spend time playing games. Lumi and Baby answers those two things: you can read the story while the children play the game.

- The questions challenge the children's imagination, wonder and curiosity.

- As a great bedtime story for the parents to spend valuable time with their children.
